# zephyr

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/NN-OpenSource/zephyr/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/NN-OpenSource/zephyr/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

This package has tools for developers of other R packages, writing messages based on options set in the developer's package. The package assumes that options are set using the `options` package.
